meanings.definition: A rare phyllosilicate mineral of the smectite group, ideally (K,Na,Ca)AlSi3O8·nH2O.
meanings.english_definition: A rare phyllosilicate mineral of the smectite group, ideally (K,Na,Ca)AlSi3O8·nH2O.

examples.sentence: Liebenerite is found in metamorphic rocks.
examples.translation: リーベネライトは変成岩中に見られる。

etymology.value: Named after Walter Liebener, a German mineralogist.
